name: Metrics
description:
Welcome to the Metrics Test, macro.  Please make your way through the environment and have a look around.  What wacky and unfinished mechanics will you find?  What overblown setpieces?  What gorgeous collectibles?  Come, macro, and find out what's working properly, what isn't, and what lies beyond. 

Oh, and do stay on the path.

Controls: WASD to move and Mouse to look around

Mild profanity and possibility of motion sickness. 

Team:

  • Quinn Barker-Plummer (qbarkerp.com, qbarkerp.itch.io)
  • Zac Emerzian (@ZacEmer)
